text: @realDonaldTrump Your Act is getting old. Nobody is taking away anybody guns. You always think people are too stupid to think for themselves. There hasn't been any gun law changes in 20 yrs. Everyone is concerned about Covid19, Unemployment, Economy & Protests. You are trying again to distract us
